tickets.title: Printer Not Working
tickets.body: I'm having trouble with my office printer. It's not printing anything, and I have an urgent report to print. Can someone please assist me with this issue?

tickets.title: Email Account Access Problem
tickets.body: I can't access my email account. It keeps saying my password is incorrect, even though I'm sure it's correct. Can you help me reset my password or resolve this issue?

tickets.title: Network Connection Slow
tickets.body: The internet connection in our office is extremely slow today, and it's affecting our work. Can someone please check and fix the network speed issue as soon as possible?
